metadata.description: Labeled email dataset for benchmarking LLM providers

emails.subject: Your Amazon.com order #123-4567890 has shipped
emails.body: Hello, Your package is on the way! Track your shipment at amazon.com/tracking. Estimated delivery: January 8, 2026.

emails.subject: TechCrunch Daily: AI startups raise $5B in Q4
emails.body: Today's top stories: 1) AI funding hits new heights 2) Apple announces new product line 3) Startup of the week. Unsubscribe here.

emails.subject: Invoice INV-2026-0042 from Stripe
emails.body: Your invoice for January 2026 is attached. Amount due: $149.00. Payment due date: January 15, 2026. View invoice online.

emails.subject: Re: Ticket #45678 - Your request has been updated
emails.body: Hi, We've updated your support ticket. Our team is working on your issue. Expected resolution: 24-48 hours. Reply to this email for updates.

emails.subject: John Doe viewed your profile
emails.body: John Doe, CEO at TechCorp, viewed your profile. See who else viewed you this week. Upgrade to Premium for more insights.

emails.subject: URGENT: You Have Won $5,000,000 USD!!!
emails.body: Dear Friend, You have been selected for $5 million inheritance. Send $500 processing fee to claim. Bank details attached. ACT NOW!

emails.subject: Meeting tomorrow at 2pm
emails.body: Hi, Can we meet tomorrow at 2pm to discuss the Q1 planning? Let me know if that works for you. Thanks!

emails.subject: Votre facture EDF du mois de janvier
emails.body: Bonjour, Votre facture d'√©lectricit√© est disponible. Montant: 87,50‚Ç¨. Date limite de paiement: 20 janvier 2026. Consultez votre espace client.

emails.subject: La Matinale du Monde - 6 janvier 2026
emails.body: Les actualit√©s du jour: politique, √©conomie, culture. Se d√©sabonner de cette newsletter.

emails.subject: Ihre Rechnung f√ºr Januar 2026
emails.body: Guten Tag, Ihre monatliche Rechnung ist bereit. Betrag: 49,99‚Ç¨. Zahlungsfrist: 25. Januar 2026. Mit freundlichen Gr√º√üen.

emails.subject: Flash Sale! 50% off electronics - Today Only
emails.body: Don't miss out! Huge discounts on TVs, laptops, and more. Free shipping on orders over $35. Shop now before it's gone!

emails.subject: FedEx Shipment 789456123 Delivery Exception
emails.body: Delivery attempted but recipient not available. Package held at local facility. Schedule redelivery or pickup at fedex.com.

emails.subject: Action Required: Complete your annual benefits enrollment
emails.body: Open enrollment ends January 15. Please review and update your health insurance and 401k selections. Contact HR with questions.

emails.subject: Your account has been compromised - verify now
emails.body: We detected unusual activity. Click here to verify your identity immediately or your account will be suspended. This is urgent!

emails.subject: You have 5 new followers this week
emails.body: See who followed you: @user1, @user2, and 3 others. Check out their profiles and follow back.

emails.subject: Photos from Christmas dinner
emails.body: Hi sweetie! Here are the photos from last week. Everyone looked so happy. Call me when you get a chance. Love, Mom

emails.subject: [MailSorter] New pull request: Feature/phase4
emails.body: RomainROCH opened a pull request. Review requested. 28 files changed, 6268 insertions. View on GitHub.

emails.subject: Daily digest: 47 messages in #engineering
emails.body: You missed 47 messages in #engineering, 12 in #random. Top threads: deployment issues, Friday social. Open Slack to catch up.

emails.subject: Your Tuesday evening trip with Uber
emails.body: Thanks for riding with Uber. Trip from Downtown to Airport. Total: $34.50. Rate your driver. Download receipt.

emails.subject: 70% off spa treatments near you!
emails.body: Exclusive deal: Full body massage + facial for only $49. Limited availability. Book now before it sells out. Unsubscribe.

emails.subject: Confirm your recent transaction
emails.body: A payment of $299.99 was sent to MERCHANT_NAME. If you didn't make this transaction, report it immediately via the PayPal app.

emails.subject: Confirmation: Hotel reservation in Paris
emails.body: Your booking is confirmed. Hotel Le Marais, Jan 20-23. Total: ‚Ç¨450. Check-in from 3pm. Print this confirmation.

emails.subject: Congratulations! You've been selected!
emails.body: Your email was randomly selected in our monthly draw. Claim ‚Ç¨1,000,000 by replying with your full name and bank details.

emails.subject: Your DHL Express shipment is out for delivery
emails.body: Shipment 1234567890 is out for delivery today. Expected by 5pm. Track live at dhl.com. Delivery signature required.

emails.subject: Quick question about the project
emails.body: Hey, do you have a minute? I wanted to discuss the timeline for the Q2 deliverables. Let's sync up today if possible.

emails.subject: Daily Digest: Stories for you
emails.body: Based on your reading history: 'The Future of AI', 'Productivity Hacks', 'Why Remote Work is Here to Stay'. Unsubscribe.

emails.subject: You have memories to look back on today
emails.body: On this day 3 years ago, you shared a post. See your memories. Also: 2 friend suggestions and 5 notifications.

emails.subject: IT Maintenance: Scheduled downtime Saturday
emails.body: Planned maintenance this Saturday 2-4am. Email and VPN may be unavailable. No action required. Contact IT for questions.

emails.subject: Prescription ready for pickup
emails.body: Your prescription is ready at CVS #1234. Pickup hours: 9am-9pm. Bring valid ID. Questions? Call the pharmacy.

emails.subject: Your credit card statement is ready
emails.body: Your January statement is available. Balance: $1,234.56. Minimum payment: $25. Due date: Jan 25. View statement online.

emails.subject: Your Netflix membership renewal
emails.body: Your subscription renewed for ‚Ç¨13.99/month. Next billing date: Feb 6. Manage your plan in account settings.

emails.subject: Proposal for Q2 engagement
emails.body: Hi, Attached is our proposal for the Q2 consulting engagement. Happy to discuss on a call. Best regards, John

emails.subject: jane_doe started following you
emails.body: jane_doe (@jane_doe) started following you. See their profile and follow back.

emails.subject: Your Spotify payment failed
emails.body: We couldn't process your payment. Update your payment method to avoid service interruption. Current status: Past due.

emails.subject: Make $10,000/week working from home!!!
emails.body: Guaranteed income! No experience needed! Join thousands earning from home. Limited spots! Sign up now! This is not a scam!

emails.subject: File shared with you: Q4_Report.pdf
emails.body: Alice shared 'Q4_Report.pdf' with you. View the file in Dropbox. You can also download it directly.

emails.subject: Your order has been delivered
emails.body: Great news! Your order containing iPhone 15 Pro was delivered today. Rate your experience. Need help? Contact Apple Support.

emails.subject: üöÄ Product Hunt Daily - Top 5 launches today
emails.body: Today's top products: 1) AI Writing Tool 2) Productivity App 3) Developer Tools... See all 15 new launches. Unsubscribe.

emails.subject: Reminder: Dental appointment tomorrow
emails.body: This is a reminder for your dental checkup tomorrow at 10am. Please arrive 10 minutes early. Call to reschedule if needed.

emails.subject: Re: Project timeline update
emails.body: Thanks for the update. The new timeline works for us. Let's proceed with the revised plan. Looking forward to the kickoff.

emails.subject: Action Required: Verify your PayPal account
emails.body: Dear customer, Your account has been limited. Click here to verify your identity and restore access. Act now to avoid suspension.
emails.notes: Phishing attempt - looks like legitimate security email

emails.subject: Your monthly statement is ready
emails.body: Your January statement is now available. Log in to view your account activity and download your statement PDF.
emails.notes: Bank statement - could be Invoices or Inbox

emails.subject: Check out this newsletter I found!
emails.body: Hey! I found this amazing tech newsletter you might like. The link is attached. Let me know what you think!
emails.notes: Personal email mentioning newsletter - should be Inbox not Newsletters

emails.subject: Invoice attached: Support subscription renewal
emails.body: Thank you for renewing your support subscription. Invoice #12345 is attached. Contact support if you have questions.
emails.notes: Support email with invoice - invoice takes priority

emails.subject: Your package delivery failed
emails.body: Delivery attempted but failed. Click here to reschedule. Your tracking number: 1Z999AA10123456784

emails.subject: Ihre Sendung ist unterwegs
emails.body: Guten Tag, Ihre Sendung mit der Nummer 123456789 ist auf dem Weg. Voraussichtliche Lieferung: morgen.

emails.subject: Su ticket de soporte #7890
emails.body: Hemos recibido su solicitud. Un agente se pondr√° en contacto con usted pronto. Ticket: #7890

emails.subject: URGENT: System maintenance tonight
emails.body: All systems will be down for maintenance from 11pm to 3am. Please save your work. Contact IT for questions.

emails.subject: You have 5 new friend requests
emails.body: People are trying to connect with you on Facebook. See your pending friend requests and respond.

emails.subject: üî• Flash Sale: 70% off everything!
emails.body: Limited time offer! 70% off all items. Shop now before stock runs out. Free shipping on orders over $50.
